title: Signal Filters
description: Filters to refine signal discovery results

max_cpm.description: Maximum effective CPM filter. Applies to signals with model='cpm', and to signals with model='percent_of_media' that have a max_cpm cap set.

max_percent.description: Maximum percent-of-media price filter. Applies only to signals with model='percent_of_media'. Signals with model='cpm' are not filtered by this field.
